settings.content: Tailor-made theme for Alltimers. Features include a mobile-first responsive design, unique typography, an edge-to-edge homepage hero, a dynamic product grid, and product pages with at-a-glance availability for each size.
This theme is fully supported by Avia Solutions. For support and customizations, please contact [info@aviasolutions.ca](mailto:info@aviasolutions.ca)

settings.label: Italicize titles, blockquotes, drop-down links, comment author name, and dates.
Inverted logo
settings.info: Use this with dark slideshow images for better visibility

settings.content: Choose your home page sections and their order.
Each section can only be used once on the home page.

settings.label: Enable white space
settings.info: Turn on white space when homepage section 1 is blank

settings.content: Turn the hero slideshow on and off from the home page section.
To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
